attributes.action: Return Wagon Wheels to their original size
attributes.additional_details: It will be a huge boost to national morale in these difficult times
attributes.background: Debate the benefits to the Nation of this confectionery crisis

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the size of confectionary products are a matter for their producers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
